title: SSO doesn't work for Flathub variant
body:
**Describe the bug**
My company uses SSO with TFA for Microsoft products. This issue occurs only for Flathub variant. Meanwhile deb variant works, it is inconvenient without auto-update.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Install from Flathub
2. Run
3. Enter SSO credentials on login prompt
4. The window with TFA token request is empty (see the screenshot)

**Expected behavior**
Should successfully request thee TFA token and thus pass authentication

**Screenshots**
![Screenshot from 2024-11-29 10-04-48](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/2fad347f-45f7-4a94-bac7-8c10a2c81775)


**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Ubuntu 22.04 (x11 mode)
 - Installation package flatpak from Flathub
 - Version 1.11.5
